faq.question: Why is there not yet a website for Forrest at apache.org?

answer.p: It is still early days in the life of the project. Please help us discuss Forrest development on the mailing list, we will then get to that phase sooner.

faq.question: Why is there no "Forrest To Do List" so that i can help?

answer.p: Short answer: There is a To Do list. It is inside the file $FORREST_HOME/forrest.xgump

Long answer: The build docs does not yet generate the To Do list or the Changes list, by extracting them from the forrest.xgump file. Please help build the stylesheets and Cocoon sitemap snippet to do that job.

faq.question: Why do the section titles not show in the answers below?

answer.p: Because we are in transition to the new document-v11.dtd and there are still some old stylesheets with matches for s1 etc. rather than matches for section. See the Demo document-v11
